alert.note: Alert for Lares; Las Marias; Maricao; San Sebastian (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 16 at 6:25PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM AST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Lares, Las Marias, Maricao and San Sebastian. * WHEN...Until 615 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. River or stream flows are elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 525 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated that most of the heavy rains continue to diminish across the area but excessive runoff from the heavy rains will continue to affect rivers and streams. Therefore the Flood advisory will continue until 615 pm. Up to 2 inches of rain have fallen so far. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lares, San Sebastian, Hato Arriba, Maricao and Juncal. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

area.areaDesc: Lares; Las Marias; Maricao; San Sebastian
